message: Congratulations! You're one of the first few buyers to have the opportunity to purchase a product from me. I'm thrilled to offer you this exclusive deal. This product is one of the best I've got, and I'm confident you'll love it. For just $10000, you'll be getting an exceptional value. I'd like to take a chance on this product, but I'd like to know more about the quality before committing to the purchase. Can you give me some statistics on the quality of the products you've sold in the past? How many products have you sold, and what percentage of them were high-quality?

That's an impressive 80% success rate, if I do say so myself. With this product, I can confidently say that there's an 80% chance it's high-quality as well. And for just $10000, you'll be getting an exceptional value regardless of whether it's high-quality or not. But I think it's worth noting that the odds are heavily in your favor. What do you think? Will you take the chance and make it yours?
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product, given the impressive 80% success rate and the high probability of it being high-quality.
